meanings.definition: The process of decorating an item with a monogram.
meanings.sent1: Monogramming adds a personal touch to gifts.
meanings.sent2: She learned monogramming to customize her towels.
meanings.sent3: The monogramming on the pillow made it feel like royalty.
meanings.sent4: Her monogramming skills turned plain items into treasures.
meanings.sent5: The art of monogramming transformed the plain bag into a stylish accessory.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a design using initials or a single letter.
meanings.sent1: Monogramming is a popular choice for wedding invitations.
meanings.sent2: He practiced monogramming to perfect his signature style.
meanings.sent3: The monogramming on the cake made it look too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her monogramming talent turned simple letters into art.
meanings.sent5: The elegance of monogramming added sophistication to the stationery.
